website_summaries.verdict: One of the brightest, clearest, and most distortion-free mirrors available.
pros: Very bright and clear with adjustable light settings that are controlled by touch
Cordless, rechargeable operation with long battery life
cons: Sensor has been known to fail after a few months of use
Price falls on the higher end of the scale

customer_reviews.title: You’re gonna love this mirror!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok girls I was skeptical about ordering this mirror after seeing reviews that said it runs off prematurely or it only turns on if you’re really close to it . Well I learned that in these cases the sensor at the top is probably just dirty. Also there is a power button on the bottom of the mirror that can use to reset it. All that being said I want everyone to know that THIS MiIRROR Is AWESOME, I love it ,love it ,love it!!!! Also you can adjust the light brightness.. if you have a problem, just call customer service it’s most often an easy fix
customer_reviews.author: Sarena Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great investment - the perfect makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: This pricey mirror is well worth it if it falls within your budget. One of the first things I noticed was the sensor light which comes on when your sit in front of it. The light and magnification is amazing. When you first sit down you realize you don't look that good. :) Applying makeup, tweezing, eyebrows, eyeliner - all goes on meticulously when using this mirror. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: The mirror itself is great, the auto on/off feature is not.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first two days I had it and then it started turning off when I was in the middle of applying make-up. I tried putting a piece of paper over the sensor (hello, I paid $200 for this thing, why am I even doing this) to no avail. I even tried waving my hands in front of it and it still turned off. No thanks, back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Light Doesn't Stay On
customer_reviews.text: I understand that it's motion activated - but the light won't stay on. It goes off right in the middle of using it. It's annoying and hard to use because the light is constantly going off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Ciribassi

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Having the brightness control on the mirror itself is a great addition. Love this mirror since there are no outlets near my vanity. My charge holds at least 3 weeks using it at least 30 minutes a day.
customer_reviews.author: CutieMinnie

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: I own the version of this mirror without brightness control and I think it's often too bright. It washes out my face and sometimes makes it difficult to see what I'm doing. With the brightness adjustment, I can lower the intensity and get a better overall view of my makeup. I can turn up the brightness for very detailed work and close inspection. I'm really glad they added brightness control and it's a necessary feature for this mirror. It's also relatively simple to use, just slide your fingers around the back bottom edge of the mirror to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Fuji

customer_reviews.title: Big Fail!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror does not function as wireless because it fails to hold a charge for more than a week. Simplyhuman refused to refund my money because I purchased from Amazon. HUGE hassle for $200 mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Item defective from the box. Would never shut off and only sporadically lit when sensor should have activated. The comments are true. Very iffy on getting A WORKING UNIT.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rizzardo

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I normally love simple human products but this mirror is a total waste of money! It doesn't stay lit even when plugged in! and when it does light up it dims for no reason...just goes from bright to low light even if I'm right in front of it and it "senses" motion which is the most annoying thing when in the middle of plucking eyebrows. I wanted to love this mirror I really did - but it's just so frustrating that I'm forced to write words of caution. And at nearly $200 it's an obimination for the brand to put this on the market with so many bugs still built in!
customer_reviews.author: write1

customer_reviews.title: Need a higher magnification
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, but wish it was a higher magnification. Wound up getting a smaller mirror with 13 magnification and putting it on the lighted mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensor does not work
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this mirror. I love the magnification and the light - but the motion sensor does not work so every time I try and use the mirror it turns off every 10 seconds. Is there a way to bypass the motion sensor and just turn the mirror on or off?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, please read the reviews. I did not want this model but because the one I really wanted was not in stock, I compromised and purchased this one. First, it does not stay charged. Second, the light won’t come on and when it does it’s not bright. I have to keep touching the sensor to adjust the brightness. I have a wall mounted one and absolutely love it and the charge lasts for weeks. This one I would return if I could because of the price. I read the reviews and thought I would get a good one. This must be a design flaw because I gambled with this purchase and lost.
customer_reviews.author: J Guilmain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror.
customer_reviews.text: It lights up when it sees my face! I also use it as a flashlight to find things on my dressing table. Love it. Best mirror ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't recharge after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mirror while it held a charge. Based on the other reviews, I think I may hold the record for shortest life until the battery quit holding a charge. I will try another charging cord, and I can call the 800 number for the warranty, but really, $199 for this hassle? Think before you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: hammienmax

customer_reviews.title: Battery life did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Charged it up fully. After rare use, required recharging after only 8 days. Recharged fully adhesion. Again, after less than two weeks of less than once a day use, it required another recharge. This is inconvenient and not up to snuff for an item at this price point. Returned the unit.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: 100% Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at the mall! My 15 year old daughter LOVES it! Great product, fast shipping 100% wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: Great lighted mirror, no cords on the counter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality mirror with good brightness that makes make-up application super easy. I use mine daily and it needs to be recharged about every 10 days. Highly recommend this mirror for good lighting, magnification and no cords on the bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: BVpattikay

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes the mirror and the light is awesome. As with a lot of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the mirror and the light is awesome. As with a lot of the reviews, the light will turn off if you move too far away from it and there is no switch to force it to stay on. I made her a little cover she puts over the sensor to keep the light on.
customer_reviews.author: mike luellen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather expensive mirror, but we think it's worth it. It is well styled and well made. As a shaving or makeup mirror (we use it for both) it is wonderful. The builtin light is adjustable and the rechargeable battery seems to last forever. So swallow hard and pay the price - it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: RJB Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold charge.
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this item. I have been looking at it in stores for awhile and was thrilled that I found this one refurbished/returned. After about two months it quit holding a charge. So my cordless mirror is now corded.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M.

customer_reviews.title: after just 5 months the battery life is poor
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the mirror in January and the light would last for 2 weeks (approx 15 hours), now it only last a few applications (2 hours) and needs charging. I didn't want a hard wired mirror or I would have bought one. Unhappy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second simple human mirror. The last one would not hold a charge any longer, but it was about seven years old. I tried a new power cord which helped a little. Anyway, I love this 5X mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dickman

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is taller than most, the light is great and bright. Looks great on the bathroom vanity and cleans up easily. I also really like, all you have to do is stand in front of it and it comes on. No buttons to push, no finger prints, and I have still not had to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised- scam!
customer_reviews.text: This product was not as advertised. There was no charger included, the mirror didn’t even have a lighting system in it, no on/off button, the base was warped...definitely not a Simple Human mirror!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Isaly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. It was pricey, but well worth it. She loves it and uses it daily. It’s neat that it’s hands free, just look at it and it turns on. It does have a brightness setting that it will default to every time which is nice. Turns itself off after you walk away. It’s not for traveling, but not impossible to take with you, just a little on the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Light doesn’t stay on during use.
customer_reviews.text: This lighted mirror is too expensive to not stay lit while I am using it. I have to place something over the sensor to keep it on while I am applying my make up.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: World’s Best Makeup Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup mirror ever. You will not regret buying this. I have 7 one in each bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hal B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She loves it. The motion sensing light works very well. The charge lasts over a month. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z

customer_reviews.title: it is too large for travel but a beautiful mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it is too large for travel but a beautiful mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Merry

customer_reviews.title: Such a good decision
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy such an expensive mirror, but I have to say that I am now buying the "mini" travel version as this lighting makes such difference for people who have trouble seeing up close without good light and magnification. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great Mirror, got this for my grand daughter for Christmas. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: HD2005HOG

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to travel with buts it's too big for that. Not too happy with the magnifying part, also , the sensor light goes off too manny times when your using it. Best to keep plugged, battery don't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Vitor Pina

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror, the brightness is perfect for indoors and I especially love the adjustability of the brightness! Another great feature is that the light comes on when you approach the mirror, then immediately turns off when you walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie5

customer_reviews.title: Clarity unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mirror on the market for women putting on makeup or using for anything face related. I purchased this as a gift for my wife and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t light up nor does it stay up when I try to adjust the height. Didn’t say in the description that it was damaged but, it is.
customer_reviews.author: Charmay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mirror
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mirror, the quality is great. The only downside is that it is only magnifying , there is no "regular" side like some makeup mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: GIRLFRIEND IS VERY HAPPY WITH THIS MIRROR. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Capitan Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This a great mirror I bought it to remove my contacts and it works great the only problem ie I have to hunt it down when I need it my wife takes it in to her bathroom for her makeup mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Emmette Duvail

customer_reviews.title: I love it minus the auto shut off feature.
customer_reviews.text: I love how how bright it is and the magnification. Only drawback is it automatically shuts off while I am doing my makeup. I have to keep messing with the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror for easily seeing detail when putting on my makeup. The combination of the magnifying and the lights is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Great product but broke after 2 months. The battery life only lasts for couple of minutes. Have to keep it on charge all the time that is not very practical. Contacted customer service. We’ll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Magnification level is ideal, no blurring. Love the instant on feature.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It is more then I would normally spend on something like this, but I'm so glad I did. It was worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about a month of usage - Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to have good tweezers handy
customer_reviews.text: This Mirror shows you what you’ve been missing. Be sure to have good tweezers handy.
customer_reviews.author: JBARB

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: did what it advertise to do. only have had it for a week, wife loves it,so far!
customer_reviews.author: Neal L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great for home use. I wouldn't use to travel. Magnification and brightness is good. Like the automatic on/off as you approach mirror.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Works well; easily adjustable light
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for extra light for eye makeup and contacts
customer_reviews.author: Janis G Lipman

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts a long time before it needs charging.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it lights up and you can apply eyeliner and makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda A. Panettiere

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: The base lights up and flashes when charging. Love the motion detection feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $200
customer_reviews.text: Light won't stay on bright enough, you have to keep hitting it even when its charged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sensor is great and is nice to look at beside being able to see your face.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bowles

customer_reviews.title: OUCH.... For $200 a 5X mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: OUCH....For $200 a 5X mirror What could be wrong HERE..DECEPTIVE DECEPTIVE Mad as Hell they want me to pay to return this descriptive listing OUCB
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LED Dimmer stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The dimmer stopped working after 2 weeks!! Disappointed with this Simplehuman product, a brand generally known for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phx777

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Good solution when an outlet is unavailable
customer_reviews.text: I read several unfavorable reviews on this unit, most all of them regarding the rechargeable battery pack. We installed it a few months ago and have had no trouble. 9 volt USB chargers are always problematic, so try an alternative one if you're having charging problems. The automatic sensor on the light works as described, the light is bright, the mirror provides good magnification and my wife loves it. We have rattled around the problem of no electrical outlet near a conventional make-up mirror. This lamp solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Worked only 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this excited for the features it has. After one month it won't hold a charge. Simple human is having me send it back for repair or replacement with a refurbished one. I bought a new one not a refurbished one. This entire process will take 6-8 weeks and I won't have a makeup mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Dal Santo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mirror especially helpful for mature women or poor vision
customer_reviews.text: I know this was very pricey but as a 60 year old woman, I needed help in make up application. I am skilled in the art of make up but cannot see properly in other make up mirrors. With this I can adjust how bright I need to go and don't have to worry that when I am out in public my colors are all wrong but looked OK when I applied them at home. It is very new so I will report any issues if necessary. This truly helps us gals with declining vision.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Feather Grey

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, looks amazing when finished with makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror... makes my makeup look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: joe raibourn

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice to be able to use it somehow for not ...
customer_reviews.text: Brightness can vary, and can not be adjusted up and down. Would be nice to be able to use it somehow for not magnifying. Overall decent product that has room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Best make-up mirror
customer_reviews.text: My wife is really particular and this is her absolute favorite make up mirror. The magnification and the clarity is amazing and when you charge it it lasts for nearly 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Joys4Me

customer_reviews.title: Make wife happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife has wanted one of these for a good while now. Got this for her for Christmas suprise gift and see loves it lighting is great can dim and brighten. The magnifying is a big plus
customer_reviews.author: underdoggy

customer_reviews.title: and was covered in sticky fingerprints like a 3 year old packed it
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a manual or any kind of paperwork, and was covered in sticky fingerprints like a 3 year old packed it. Was a buzzkill considering how excited I was. Other than it being filthy, it seems to work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This Past Christmas gift for my wife, she loves it. We haven’t had to recharge the battery yet and she uses it everyday. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: WildWestie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the high price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old mirror was not as bright as I would like. This is bright but dims if you move back from it, even a little. It also does not magnify as much as I would like. Very pricey not to have what I need. Aesthetically it is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: petesgirl

customer_reviews.title: works well, easy to recharge when required
customer_reviews.text: Holds its charge for a long time, easily recharges, good light and magnification, making it easy to see where extra attention is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Charges
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just what I wanted. Not meant for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: babsie

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Wife and wanted one of these for a while. I picked it up and she loves it. Light works perfectly, easy to charge and image is great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: needed something taller.  otherwise this was a great mirror.
customer_reviews.text: great mirror. i needed something taller but this was bright and heavy and went well in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: There is a problem with the mirror not staying in the extended position.
customer_reviews.text: I like the mirror we have 2 of them but this is the second one in 3 months that won't stay extended in the up position and is too short if not.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Shea

customer_reviews.title: Light not as Bright as I'd like it to be
customer_reviews.text: The light isn't as Bright as I'd like when you approach the mirror
customer_reviews.author: Heidi McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My make up has never looked so good!
customer_reviews.author: %Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked the mirror but it doesn’t produce enough light for my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: L Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great for looking at your zits up close but useless ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for looking at your zits up close but useless when used from a distance eg to brush your hair. You need to be extremely close so you can’t get a full view of our face.
customer_reviews.author: Mokum56

product_meta.title: simplehuman 8" Round Sensor Makeup Mirror with Touch-Control Brightness, 5x Magnification Rechargeable and Cordless, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:Adjustable Brightness| Color:Brushed Stainless Steelsimplehuman sensor mirror lights up automatically as your face approaches. Its true-lux light system simulates natural sunlight, allowing you to see full color variation, so you'll know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless. The touch-control brightness gives you fast, intuitive control over a continuous range of brightness. And unlike traditional makeup vanity mirrors' Bulb lighting, our long-lasting LEDs won't burn out or diminish even after years of use. The mirror is cordless and rechargeable - one charge lasts up to 5 weeks. 5x magnification - ideal for providing exceptional detail while still allowing you to see your entire face at once.App-enabled:No. For maximum efficiency, always leave the mirror in “on” mode
feature_bullets: 5-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
TRU-LUX LIGHT SYSTEM - Simulates natural sunlight allowing you to see subtle variations in your makeup color so you’ll always know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless
TOUCH-CONTROL BRIGHTNESS - Gives you fast, intuitive control over a continuous range of brightness from 100 lux to 800 lux
SENSOR ON/OFF - Automatically lights up as your face approaches, then turns off after you walk away
SURGICAL GRADE LEDs - Will perform like new after 40,000 hours — that's an hour a day, every day, for more than 100 years
5x MAGNIFICATION - Provides exceptional detail while still allowing you to see your entire face at once
RECHARGEABLE AND CORDLESS - Can be used without a cord for up to 5 weeks on a single charge.
MAXIMUM ADJUSTABILITY - Allows the mirror to tilt back fully so you always have a clear, comfortable view — even while standing up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars302 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Warranty card - 5 year^USB Cable 3 ft^USB power adaptor
